comment:
* Contract between the popup window and a presenter that is responsible for * showing/hiding/updating the actual window. * *

This can be useful if the anchor is in one process and the backing window is owned by * another process.

methods.name: void show(WindowManager.LayoutParams p, Rect transitionEpicenter, boolean fitsSystemWindows, int layoutDirection)
methods.comment:
* Shows the backing window.
         *
         * @param p The window layout params.
         * @param transitionEpicenter The transition epicenter if animating.
         * @param fitsSystemWindows Whether the content view should account for system decorations.
         * @param layoutDirection The content layout direction to be consistent with the anchor.

methods.name: void hide(Rect transitionEpicenter)
methods.comment:
* Hides the backing window.
         *
         * @param transitionEpicenter The transition epicenter if animating.

methodNames: void show(WindowManager.LayoutParams p, Rect transitionEpicenter, boolean fitsSystemWindows, int layoutDirection)
